tp:treatment-sec.p: †Galeaspidae Liu 1965: 125, 130 (family) † Galeaspis Liu 1965 [ type genus preoccupied by † Galeaspis Ivshin 1955 in Trilobita ; invalid, Art. 39]
†Liuaspidinidae [†Liuaspididae] Whitley 1976: 48 (family) † Liuaspis Whitley 1976 [ type genus preoccupied by Liuaspis Borchsenius 1960 in Hemiptera ; invalid, Art. 39]
†Eugaleaspidae Liu 1980: 256 (family) † Eugaleaspis Liu 1980 [family name also seen as † Eugaleaspididae ]
†Tridensaspidae Liu 1986: 2 , 9 (family) † Tridensaspis Liu 1986 [family name sometimes seen as †Tridensaspididae]
